sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext,Fragment} from 'react' import { Section, ContainerLogOut, LogOut, Div, Nick, AnotherDiv, Imagem, Figure, TextContainer, Nome, Email, Localidade, FollowContainer, FollowersContainer, Followers, Following, Repositorio, Text, BioContainer, Bio, BioText } from './styles'; import { FiLogOut} from 'react-icons/fi' import { context } from '../../context'; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import { BiArrowBack } from "react-icons/bi"; const UserContainer = (props) => { const ctx = useContext(context) const history = useHistory() const handleOnClick = async (user) => { try { const response = await api.get(`${user}`) const repos = await api.get(`${user}/repos`) const followers = await api.get(`${user}/followers`) const following = await api.get(`${user}/following`) console.log(response) ctx.SetUserData(response.data) ctx.SetRepos(repos.data) ctx.SetFollowers(followers.data) ctx.SetFollowing(following.data) ctx.setHasError(false) ctx.setLoggedUser(false) history.push('/Home') } catch (err) { //ctx.setHasError(true) } } return ( {ctx.loggedUser && (
{props.nick} history.push('/')}>Sair
{props.name} {props.email} {props.localidade} history.push('/Followers')}> {props.followers} Seguidores history.push('/Following')}> {props.following} Seguindo history.push('/Repos')} > {props.reps} Repositórios BIO {props?.biotext}
)} {!ctx.loggedUser && (
history.goBack()}> ctx.setLoggedUser(true)} >Salvar history.goBack()} size={15}/>
{props.name} {props.email} {props.localidade} {props.followers} Seguidores {props.following} Seguindo {props.reps} Repositórios BIO {props?.biotext}
)} )} export default UserContainer;
